### Overview

* I am using `spack-0.14.2` and I am unable to install `fontconfig@2.13.` with either `gcc@4.8.5` or `gcc@9.2.0`.
* Error: `/tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-fontconfig-2.13.1-m4i64qfhq2rk6hhhznqwxdxvcml6ninj/spack-src/fc-cache/.libs/lt-fc-cache: failed`
* Possibly related to #12547 (font-util).  I had to comment out `font-bh-ttf` to install `font-util`.
